entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
